mutants.mutated_line: filtered_list = [s.strip() for s in strings if s.strip() == '']

def filter_and_sort(strings):
    filtered_list = [s.strip() for s in strings if s.strip() == '']
    deduplicated_list = list(set([s.lower() for s in filtered_list]))
    sorted_list = sorted(deduplicated_list, reverse=True)
    return sorted_list

def filter_and_sort(strings):
    filtered_list = [s.strip() for s in strings if s.strip() != '']
    deduplicated_list = list(set([s.lower() for s in filtered_list]))
    sorted_list = sorted(deduplicated_list, reverse=False)
    return sorted_list

def filter_and_sort(strings):
    filtered_list = [s.strip() for s in strings if s.strip() != 'MUTATED']
    deduplicated_list = list(set([s.lower() for s in filtered_list]))
    sorted_list = sorted(deduplicated_list, reverse=True)
    return sorted_list
